name: siso-public-monorepo
description: SISO Production Monorepo - Admin, Client & Partner Applications

scripts.dev: npm run dev:admin & npm run dev:clients & npm run dev:partners
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:packages: npm run build -w packages/shared-types && npm run build -w packages/shared-config && npm run build -w packages/shared-services && npm run build -w packages/shared-ui
scripts.build:apps: npm run build:admin & npm run build:clients & npm run build:partners
scripts.analyze: npm run analyze -w admin && npm run analyze -w clients && npm run analyze -w partners

author: SISO Agency
